intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce costs and maximize value.
intents.search_context: Users search this when looking for practical ways to lower expenses or optimize their insurance plans.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital tools to offer personalized insurance savings calculators.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded tools/calculators.

intents.sub_intent: understanding key insurance concepts (e.g., 5 P's of insurance)
intents.user_motivation: Users want to understand foundational concepts to make informed decisions.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are new to insurance or seeking clarity on terminology.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide clear, jargon-free explanations with visual aids (e.g., infographics).
intents.content_format_recommendation: Educational article with diagrams and examples.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they receive the full benefits of their insurance policies.
intents.search_context: Users search this after experiencing an event requiring a claim or preparing for potential claims.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Offer step-by-step guides and digital claim submission tools.

intents.sub_intent: how to avoid high auto insurance costs
intents.user_motivation: Users want to identify strategies to reduce their auto insurance expenses.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing providers or renewing policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's competitive auto insurance rates and digital comparison tools.

intents.sub_intent: common mistakes to avoid when applying for life insurance
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid errors that could lead to higher premiums or denied applications.
intents.search_context: Users search this when preparing to apply for life insurance or researching policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide pre-application checklists and digital tools to simplify the process.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Checklist-style article with examples of common mistakes.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to avoid high auto insurance costs
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can position itself as a leader in cost-saving tools and personalized insurance solutions.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop a unified hub with calculators, comparison tools, and actionable guides.

sub_intents: understanding key insurance concepts (e.g., 5 P's of insurance)
common mistakes to avoid when applying for life insurance
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Leverage ING's trusted brand to simplify complex topics and build user confidence.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a series of educational articles and videos with interactive elements.

intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Offer seamless digital claim submission tools and expert advice.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop a claims management toolkit with step-by-step guides and FAQs.

highest_probability_streams: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to avoid high auto insurance costs
quick_wins: Create actionable listicles for saving on premiums.
Develop a downloadable checklist for maximizing claims.
Offer comparison tables for auto insurance rates.
strategic_priorities: Invest in interactive tools (e.g., calculators, claim submission platforms).
Build a comprehensive educational hub for insurance concepts.
Enhance ING's positioning as a trusted advisor in insurance cost optimization.
